name: Organic A2 Ghee
description: Our pure, hand-churned A2 Desi Cow Ghee is a testament to tradition and purity. Made from the milk of grass-fed Gir cows, it is a powerhouse of nutrition and flavor. The traditional Bilona method of churning curd ensures that all the natural goodness is preserved. It's rich in Omega-3 and Omega-9 fatty acids, vitamins A, D, E, and K, and has a high smoke point, making it perfect for all types of cooking.

certifications.name: FSSAI Certified
certifications.description: Licensed by the Food Safety and Standards Authority of India.

certifications.name: India Organic
certifications.description: Certified organic by the National Programme for Organic Production (NPOP).

reviews.author: Anjali R.
reviews.comment: The aroma and taste are just like homemade ghee. Superb quality!

reviews.author: Vikram Singh
reviews.comment: Best ghee I've ever purchased online. You can tell it's pure.

name: Heirloom Tomato Box
description: A vibrant assortment of juicy, flavorful heirloom tomatoes, grown with passion using regenerative organic methods. Each box is a surprise mix of colors, shapes, and sizes, from deep reds to sunny yellows and striped greens. Perfect for salads, sauces, or simply sliced with a sprinkle of salt.

certifications.name: PGS-India Certified
certifications.description: Certified under the Participatory Guarantee System for India.

reviews.author: Priya D.
reviews.comment: So beautiful and delicious! Made the most amazing caprese salad.

name: Wild Forest Honey
description: Raw, unprocessed honey harvested sustainably from the nectar of wild flowers in the pristine forests of the Western Ghats. Our honey is never heated or filtered, preserving all its natural enzymes, pollen, and medicinal properties. A truly wild taste of nature.

certifications.name: FSSAI Certified
certifications.description: Licensed by the Food Safety and Standards Authority of India.

name: Farm-Fresh Paneer
description: Soft, creamy, and melt-in-your-mouth paneer (cottage cheese) made from fresh, whole A2 milk. Our paneer is made daily in small batches without any preservatives or additives. Its delicate texture makes it perfect for curries, grills, or simply pan-fried.

details.ingredients: A2 Cow Milk, Natural Lemon Juice

name: Assorted Leafy Greens
description: A power-packed mix of fresh, seasonal leafy greens. Our selection changes based on what's best in the season but often includes spinach, kale, amaranth, and lettuce. Triple-washed and ready to fuel your day.

details.ingredients: Seasonal mix of organic leafy greens

name: Cold-Pressed Groundnut Oil
description: Nutrient-rich groundnut oil extracted using traditional 'kachi ghani' (cold-press) methods. This process uses a wooden press to extract oil without heat, retaining all its natural nutrients, aroma, and flavor. It's unrefined and free from any chemicals.

certifications.name: FSSAI Certified
certifications.description: Licensed by the Food Safety and Standards Authority of India.

name: Organic Mangoes (Seasonal)
description: Juicy, sweet, and fragrant organic mangoes, delivered straight from the farm during the season. Our mangoes are naturally ripened without any chemical agents, ensuring you get the authentic taste and health benefits. Variety depends on the peak of the season.

name: Ancient Grain Flour Mix
description: A wholesome, gluten-free blend of ancient grains like jowar (sorghum), bajra (pearl millet), and ragi (finger millet). Stone-ground to preserve nutrients, this flour mix is perfect for making nutritious rotis, dosas, and baked goods.
